data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Scherz, Mark D., Ruthensteiner, Bernhard, Vences, Miguel, Glaw, Frank (2014): A new microhylid frog, genus Rhombophryne, from northeastern Madagascar, and a re-description of R. serratopalpebrosa using micro-computed tomography. Zootaxa 3860 (6): 547-560, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3860.6.3
